The Elder Paṭṭipupphiya’s Birth Story
“When the Sambuddha,
the Great Seer Padumuttara, was extinguished,

original: Samāgamma janā sabbe,🔽sarīraṁ nīharanti te.🔽Nīharante sarīramhi,
analyzed: samāgamma janā sabbe  sarīram nīharanti te  nīharante sarīramhi
translated: all the people gathered together🔽and took out his bodily remains.🔽As they were taking out the bodily remains,
while the drums were being played,
with a confident mind and a happy mind,
I worshipped with a paṭṭipuppha flower.
For a hundred thousand eons,
the flower I worshipped with,
I do not know of any bad destination,
the result of worshipping the bodily remains.
My defilements have been burnt up,
all my existences have been uprooted,
like an elephant breaking its bonds,
I live without defilements.
How welcome it was for me
to come into the presence of the Buddha!
The three knowledges have been attained,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been accomplished.
The four analytical insights,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been accomplished.”🔽Thus the elder Paṭṭipupphiya recited these verses.
